import ReactMarkdown from 'react-markdown' import React ,{useState} from 'react' import Button from '@material-ui/core/Button'; import {Card, Badge,Collapse} from 'react-bootstrap' export default function job({job}){ return ( <>
{job.title} - {job.company} {new Date(job.created_at).toLocaleDateString()} {job.type} {job.location}
{job.company_description}
) }
